sqlMap.sql: SELECT a.ID, a.COMPANY_ID, a.COMPANY_NAME, a.COMPANY_CODE, a.PUBNUM_ID, a.OCCUR_DATE, a.PAY_COUNT, a.PAY_MONEY, a.UPLOAD_DATE FROM WSTRADE a WHERE ( 1 = 1 ) <#if id?exists && id!=""> And a.ID=:id </#if> <#if companyId?exists && companyId!=""> And a.COMPANY_ID=:companyId </#if> <#if companyCode?exists && companyCode!=""> And a.COMPANY_CODE=:companyCode </#if> <#if companyName?exists && companyName!=""> And a.COMPANY_NAME=:companyName </#if> <#if pubnumId?exists && pubnumId!=""> And a.PUBNUM_ID=:pubnumId </#if> <#if occurDate?exists && occurDate!=""> And a.OCCUR_DATE=:occurDate </#if> <#if payCount?exists && payCount!=""> And a.PAY_COUNT=:payCount </#if> <#if payMoney?exists && payMoney!=""> And a.PAY_MONEY=:payMoney </#if> <#if uploadDate?exists && uploadDate!=""> And a.UPLOAD_DATE=:uploadDate </#if> <#if oderbyField?exists && oderbyField!=""> Order by ${oderbyField} </#if> <#if oderbyAscOrDesc?exists && oderbyAscOrDesc!=""> ${oderbyAscOrDesc} </#if>
INSERT INTO WSTRADE (ID, COMPANY_ID, CARD_NAME, CARD_IMAGE_SRC) VALUES ( :id, :companyId, :cardName, :cardImageSrc)
UPDATE WSTRADE SET COMPANY_ID = :companyId, CARD_NAME = :cardName, CARD_IMAGE_SRC = :cardImageSrc WHERE ID = # {id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
